get.summary: Get guest lists from Emka Backend
get.description: Emka backend is a layer from application mother.

parameters.name: ballroomId
parameters.description: ID of the ballroom to retrieve guests for

guest_id.description: Id that represent guest in major Emka Application. Give string cause assume it might be UUID

element_id.description: Guests will be bounded to chair. Element id indicates to which element guest is bounded.

ballroom_id.description: Guest is bound to specific stage/ballroom

seated.description: Indicate if guest is bound to seat

group.description: Indicate to which group guest belong to

age_group.description: Indicate to which age group guest belong to

menu.description: Indicate which menu guest want in event, S like Standard, V like Vegetarian

parameters.description: Additional parameters for guest if needed.

parameters.description: ID of the guest to retrieve
